price: He is just a madman, so bear with him for a while[7].”
arabic: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلُۢ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٞ فَتَرَبَّصُواْ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ
footnotes: [7] Perhaps he may recover from his insanity or his affair may become clear to people.
